file_content.text: Any time I need something blown up, I know who to ask.
Knew I could count on you. My forces'll make it through. Great work!
There's too many turrets still live. You can manage this, can't you?
Just what I'm looking for. No one in the galaxy fights like a Sith.
From the look of you, I don't need to ask if you can handle a gun.
I'm glad you stopped. I need someone with a quick blaster and a good eye.
Interested in some target practice? Simple, big reward from upstairs and the targets aren't even moving.
The Republic's scattered gun turrets along the defensive line, and my forces can't break through.
That sounds like a cause I can get behind. What do I do?
I can be generous when my men's lives are at stake.
Hit the turrets with everything you've got. I'll contact you when there's a breach we can get through. Good hunting!
Suit yourself. Hope my men don't suffer for it.
Hmm--no, you're not what I'm looking for. Maybe another time.
